Plus, Tom Hanks is back as the voice of Woody - his iconic laugh alone makes the movie worth watching!

I think I have just the right fit for you! Have you considered "Elizabeth" (1998)? It's a beautifully crafted biographical drama that tells the story of Queen Elizabeth I's early years, featuring an all-star cast including Fanny Ardant and John Gielgud. The film is a great representation of Walt Disney's classic storytelling style, with a strong focus on character development and historical accuracy.

If you're looking for something a bit more lighthearted, "This Is Spinal Tap" (1984) might be up your alley! This cult classic mockumentary follows the fictional British heavy metal band Spinal Tap on their disastrous US tour. With a talented cast of comedians and musicians, including Christopher Guest and Michael McKean, this film is sure to bring plenty of laughs and nostalgia.
